Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO ENVIRONMENTAL CONSERVATION

Title: Establishes a sustainable aviation fuel tax credit
Summary: Establishes a sustainable aviation fuel tax credit and eligibility criteria for such tax credit.
LawCode: Add §5-112, Energy L, add §§50 & 187-s, amd §§210-B & 606, Tax L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the energy law and the tax law, in relation to establishing a sustainable aviation fuel tax credit in New York state
